name: Terrano Connect
description: Terrano Connect is a comprehensive yet intuitive interface to manage and control your Terrano-XT communication systems. Personalize your device, set all its various features and control it on the go with a clean, engaging and easy to use design. Weather its Music, audio sharing, Radio, and Bluetooth intercom or phone control  Terrano Connect got you covered. Including Quick Access button to enable full control of all the above from one screen!   Just try it out for yourself!  Terrano Connect selected features: Remote Control and Bluetooth Intercoms Phone, music and radio control Auto day/night mode Quick Access Complete device setting, presets and customization. Embedded pocket guides Smart audio mix Updates on latest firmware Multi-lingual support Reset device Access to support  About Terrano Systems: Creating hi-end communication and entertainment systems for Sport & Outdoor is what we do, and we are passionate about how we do it. Its founders bring to Terrano strong financial and technical backing and decades of experience and market leadership in high-performance, field proven out-door Bluetooth communication systems. The Terrano XT is the worlds leading high-end communication and entertainment device that was especially designed for bicycle riders. It represents the culmination of a decade-long experience in designing and developing wireless devices in very challenging outdoor environments.
